[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#09131E” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(9,19,30,0.85) 0%|rgba(9,19,30,0.85) 100%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(9,19,30,0.85)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(9,19,30,0.85)” background_image=”https://rosengroup.ca/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/advisory-team-working-together.jpg” custom_padding=”120px||120px||false|false” custom_css_main_element=”background-position: 50% 32%;” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||8px||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

À propos de nous

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width_tablet=”500px” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ module_alignment_tablet=”center” module_alignment_phone=”” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Groupe Rosen gestion privée de patrimoine Ltée est une société de conseil financier de premier plan

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Groupe Rosen gestion privée de patrimoine Ltée, avec bureaux à Yorkville, Oakville et Pointe-Claire, est une société de conseil financier de premier plan qui se consacre à la fourniture de services de gestion de patrimoine personnalisés aux médecins, dentistes et particuliers prospères. L'entreprise s'engage profondément à élaborer des stratégies financières personnalisées qui aident les clients à naviguer dans les complexités de l'accumulation, de la préservation et du transfert de patrimoine.

Le Groupe Rosen propose une gamme complète de services, notamment la gestion des investissements, la planification de la retraite, la planification successorale, l'optimisation fiscale et la gestion des risques. S'appuyant sur des années d'expérience et une compréhension approfondie du paysage financier, l'équipe travaille en étroite collaboration avec les clients pour créer des solutions sur mesure qui correspondent à leurs objectifs individuels.

Chez Groupe Rosen, la confiance, la transparence et un engagement indéfectible envers l'excellence sont les fondements de chaque relation client. En mettant l'accent sur le succès à long terme, l'entreprise veille à ce que les clients soient en mesure de prendre des décisions éclairées, leur donnant ainsi la confiance nécessaire pour assurer leur avenir financier.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#09131E” background_image=”https://rosengroup.ca/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/cta-footer-background-paralax_2.jpg” parallax=”on” custom_padding=”120px||120px||false|false” global_module=”868″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_3,1_3″ make_equal=”on” module_class=”align-center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_typing_effect before_typing_effect=”Invest in ” typing_effect=”yourself.|your future.” typing_speed=”50ms” typing_backdelay=”3000ms” typing_cursor=”| ” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”60px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” header_text_align_tablet=”center” header_text_align_phone=”” header_text_align_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_font_size_tablet=”48px” header_font_size_phone=”34px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][/dsm_typing_effect][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjM4OCJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Contact Us” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”df9c7a6a-ffe3-4d5f-9c80-8d55d8fb5bf6″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered:
About UsRosen Group Private Wealth Management Ltd. Is A Premier Financial Advisory FirmRosen Group Private Wealth Management Ltd., with offices in Yorkville, Oakville, and Pointe-Claire, is a premier financial advisory firm dedicated to providing personalized wealth management services for doctors, dentists, and successful individuals. The firm is deeply committed to crafting custom financial strategies that help clients navigate the complexities of wealth accumulation, preservation, and transfer. Rosen Group offers a comprehensive range of services, including investment management, retirement planning, estate planning, tax optimization, and risk management. Leveraging years of experience and a thorough understanding of the financial landscape, the team works closely with clients to create tailored solutions that align with their individual objectives. At Rosen Group, the foundation of every client relationship is trust, transparency, and an unwavering commitment to excellence. With a focus on long-term success, the firm ensures that clients are empowered to make informed decisions, giving them confidence in securing their financial futures.

Investir dans yourself. your future.
